name: Yes, We Lick!
description:
Being a fly is not easy. You just stroll and fly around all day, thinking about nothing.

But then - all of a sudden - a reptile spots you in its terrarium and hunts you! It flung its tongue towards you! Now you are stuck on it! But it is not too late, you can still escape: Thankfully, there are other insects and flies around. Gather them together, let them stick on the reptile's tongue and together, with enough FLY POWER, escape!

Controls:

 Left JoystickMovementA-ButtonIncrease altitude

=========

How to install:

Download the zip folder, extract it and start the yeswelick.exe :D

=========

Entry for the MMarmelade Game Jam April 2020, theme: Crowd Licking

Team Members:

  • Leander Edler-Golla
  • Christian Keiler
